Unatego Central School Closed - March 16th - May 14th

div.class: col-xs-12 col-sm-12 col-md-7 col-lg-6 col-md-offset-1 Header_Margin

div.p:
2641 State Highway 7
P.O. Box 483
Otego, NY 13825

span.p: The Unatego Central School District Board of Education will meet on Monday, April 20, 2020 in the Board Room at the Junior-Senior High School. In order to comply with the Governor’s Executive Orders, Board of Education members may attend in person or from a remote location via Zoom videoconferencing. Members of the public are invited to attend remotely but there will not be a public comment option.
Members of the public wishing to attend via videoconference or by telephone may do so. Here is the information needed to attend the virtual meeting:

div.a: School Closure Update—April 9, 2020-Click for more details
Our Annual SADD Run/walk has been changed to a Virtual Event! Click for more details
